name: ExtremeTestFlight
description:
How good of a pilot are you. Can you take the experimental rocket on a journey through the most extreme test flight facility of all time?

Pit your wits against moving panels, land on a floating platform and fire the boosters at just the right strength to get through the gaps.

CONTROLS

  • Spacebar - fire boosters
  • A - move left
  • D - move right
